title: How to Post Links on Facebook: Desktop & Mobile

steps.title: Go to the content you want to link to.
steps.content: Go to the content you want to link to. You can also post a link on Facebook by copying a website's address from your web browser on your computer, phone, or tablet.

steps.title: Select the page's URL.
steps.content: Select the page's URL. Click or tap the address bar at the top or bottom of your browser window to select the URL of the current page. Some apps and websites, including YouTube, will have a Share option that you can select to bring up a Copy link option as well.

steps.title: Copy
steps.content: Copy the URL. On a phone or tablet, tap the selected URL, then tap Copy in the resulting pop-up menu. On a computer, right-click the selected link, then select Copy . This will copy the URL to your clipboard, meaning you can now go to Facebook and post it.

steps.title: Open Facebook and select the "What's on your mind" box.
steps.content: Open Facebook and select the "What's on your mind" box. It's at the top of the News Feed. You can use the Facebook app on your iPhone, iPad , or Android or use the Facebook website at https://www.facebook.com/ . Make sure you're logged into your account.

steps.title: Paste the link into the field.
steps.content: Paste the link into the field. On a phone or tablet, tap and hold the typing area and select Paste . On a computer, right-click the typing area and select Paste . You can also use the keyboard shortcut: CTRL + V (Windows) or CMD + V (Mac) to paste.

steps.title: Click or tap Post.
steps.content: Click or tap Post . This will post the link to your Facebook timeline. [1] X Research source For more visibility on your post, you can share it with a friend or group.

steps.title: Go to the content you want to share.
steps.content: Go to the content you want to share. You can share content from a web browser or app on your computer, Android, or iPhone. Navigate to the page, video, photo, or other content you want to post to Facebook. You can share content from many apps, such as YouTube and Pinterest . You can also share links directly from many blogs and websites.

steps.title: Select the "Facebook" or "Share" option.
steps.content: Select the "Facebook" or "Share" option. Some sites offer a button that allows you to instantly share a link to Facebook. Others have a Share button or icon that brings up a list of apps or websites that you can use to share the link. If you can't find a sharing button, you'll need to copy a link instead.

steps.title: Click or tap the "Facebook" icon.
steps.content: Click or tap the "Facebook" icon. This is the icon found in the previous step. If you're prompted to sign into Facebook, tap the Facebook App option and enter your login information. A premade post will appear with the link. You can add text, emojis, tags, or other edits if needed.

steps.title: Click or tap Post.
steps.content: Click or tap Post . It's in the top-right corner of the window. Doing so will post the link to your Facebook Timeline.
